name: Special Abilities
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Example Aggregate/Security Mannequin/Special Abilities

sections.body: The synthetic flesh and hair of a security mannequin give it a +8 bonus on Disguise checks to appear human (but not to impersonate a specific human).
sections.name: False Flesh
sections.url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Hazards and Artifacts/Artifical Intelligence/Artificial Intelligences/Example Aggregate/Security Mannequin/Special Abilities/False Flesh
